attributes.action: Abolish parking charges for all NHS workers at Hospitals
attributes.additional_details: It is an absolute disgrace that the government requires our most essential healthcare workers to pay for parking at their places of work, especially during the COVID19 pandemic. The government cannot glorify the work of the NHS and then insult that work by forcing them to pay for parking.
attributes.background: scrap legislation that requires NHS workers to pay parking charges at all Hospitals in England and Wales.
